com.hoosteen.graphics

Class Rect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hoosteen.graphics.Rect

  • public class Rect
extends java.lang.Object
    Rectangle. Has an (x, y) coordinate in the top left, with a width and and height.
    Author:
    Justin
